_header: Ipocras made this book / Whoso will therein look
_description: Verses at the end of a Book of Medicines

BodLauMis685.First Lines: Ipocras made thys bokho so wylle ther inne loke…
BodLauMis685.Last Lines:
…the fyrste way ate the hed he moste be gynneand afterward
                    atte alle othere lymmys
BodLauMis685.Editions:
Keiser,  George R. 
             “Verse Introductions to Middle English Medical Treatises.” 
             English Studies
         84 (2003): 301-17: 314.
